profile.title: profile
profile.content: Currently a fourth-year computer engineering student enrolled in a work-study program, I am seeking new and stimulating challenges. With two years of experience as a Fullstack Developer, I have refined my skills in both front-end and back-end development. I am deeply committed to delivering high-quality solutions in a timely manner. My involvement in diverse projects and familiarity with various programming languages and frameworks have made me highly adaptable, allowing me to contribute effectively to the success of dynamic development teams.

nsysu.1: Assisting in medical imaging analysis using machine learning techniques

work-study-program.1: Experienced developer proficient in both frontend and backend technologies (APIs and web applications) using Java Spring, Angular, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.
work-study-program.2: Developed a user interface for verifying banking details via the CoP system, based on a pre-existing technical connector.
work-study-program.3: Contributed to a collaborative SaaS solution aimed at combating financial fraud.
work-study-program.4: Worked within microservice architectures orchestrated through Kubernetes.
work-study-program.5: Implemented agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban.
work-study-program.6: Strong problem-solving abilities and meticulous attention to code quality.
work-study-program.7: Played a key role in optimizing application performance, enhancing user experience, and implementing various new features.

internship.1: Maintained the operational status of the application while integrating new features and a revamped design system.
internship.2: Improved and corrected unit, integration, and end-to-end tests using Cypress to enhance code quality and application robustness.
internship.3: Contributed to the migration of the application to a major version of Angular.

cpe.dates-job-title: 2022 – 2025: Engineering Degree in Computer Science and Communication Networks (IRC)
cpe.1: Majors: Object-Oriented Programming, Information Systems Architecture, Dynamic Web Applications
cpe.2: Minors: Accounting, Economics, Project Management, Mathematics, English

dut.main-content: Two-year university diploma in general computer science with introductions to data structures, operating systems, Git, various programming languages, UML, Merise, etc.

skills.title: skills
skills.content.1: Programming languages and frameworks I am proficient in
skills.content.2: Development, agile project management, devOps tools

jamify.title: Jamify – Music Social Network
jamify.content: Backend design and development using Spring (APIs, ESB with ActiveMQ, integration of external APIs) within a microservices architecture.

cv-angular.title: Interactive CV with Angular
cv-angular.content: CV deployed on AWS using Kubernetes & ArgoCD with integrated CI/CD. Frontend in Angular, backend in progress.

gymrats.title: GymRats – Mobile App for Sports Coaches
gymrats.content: React Native app with Spring microservices backend. Ongoing project focused on workout management.

others.title: Academic Projects
others.content: Various projects in Java, .NET, Angular, and SQL with emphasis on architecture and best practices.

team-spirit.title: Team Spirit
team-spirit.content: Altruistic and supportive, promotes collaboration and contributes to team unity and shared objectives.

serious.title: Diligent Worker
serious.content: Punctual and reliable; consistently meets deadlines and delivers high-quality work.

autonomous.title: Autonomous
autonomous.content: Works independently, solves problems proactively, and adapts quickly to new challenges.
